name: 2003 (Jeme)
description:
2003 is a fast-paced music game that you play with two keys.

How to play
  • Tap the right key (see below) at right time when circle enters on the colored line.
  • You have only one chance, if you miss, you fail.
Features
  • 4 Different levels with different game mechanics and difficulties.
  • 100% free game.
  • Discord Rich Presence.
  • Runs even on old and low-end computers.
Controls
  • Orange - A, F, mouse left click (You can press any of them)
  • Blue - D, J, mouse right click (You can press any of them)
  • Pause game - Esc
  • Restart - R
